name: Expert
skill: Acrobatics +9, Performance +5, Persuasion +5, Sleight of hand +6, Stealth +9
languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Helpful
text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack's damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
text: The expert has thieves' tools and a musical instrument.

action.name: Extra Attack
text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

description: Source: Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath
